last_episode_to_air.name: The Sea
last_episode_to_air.overview: In his effort to save Samira and Jonas, Charly comes face-to-face with Hassan. Everything comes down to the toss of a coin.

name: Crooks
overview: A priceless coin puts rival gangs across Europe at odds, forcing a retired safecracker to team up with a two-bit gangster for one last heist.
tagline: One heist. Two crooks. Three cities.

episodes.name: Panther
episodes.overview: Charly's former life as a talented safecracker catches up to him when he is forced to steal a valuable coin from crime boss Hassan Al-Walid.

episodes.name: The Al-Walids
episodes.overview: Charly sends Samira and Jonas to Marseille and finds an unlikely ally in Joseph, a washed-up gangster who was sent to retrieve the coin.

episodes.name: Red
episodes.overview: With multiple killers hot on his heels, Charly agrees to sell the coin for his safety. Joseph sees an opportunity for payback.

episodes.name: The Ambulance
episodes.overview: Charly and Joseph flee to Italy to seek shelter. Meanwhile, Hassan sends his volatile cousin to Marseille.

episodes.name: Old Friends
episodes.overview: Joseph sees only one way out, but Charly pulls him back from the brink. Samira and Jonas are discovered by the Al-Walids.

episodes.name: Rami
episodes.overview: Charly discovers that the most feared woman in Marseille has taken Samira and Jonas. Joseph stumbles across a safe spot for the coin.

episodes.name: Madame
episodes.overview: Joseph enlists Nina's help. Hassan finds a traitor in his midst. Charly is forced to plan an impossible heist.

episodes.name: The Sea
episodes.overview: In his effort to save Samira and Jonas, Charly comes face-to-face with Hassan. Everything comes down to the toss of a coin.
